tool_description: Use the AWS Machine Learning Comprehend Service to detect if text contains Personally Identifiable Information (PII) such as names, bank account numbers, phone numbers, etc.
name: AWS Detect PII
title: AWS Detect PII

api_list.name: Contains PII
api_list.description: Uses the AWS Machine Learning Comprehend Service to detect if text contains Personally Identifiable Information (PII).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aws-detect-pii.p.rapidapi.com/comprehend/contains-pii"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aws-detect-pii.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aws-detect-pii.p.rapidapi.com/comprehend/contains-pii"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
